mapper.sql: id, icon, title, name, type, src, close, parent_id, remake, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, enabled, template, sort
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu (id, icon, title, name, type, src, close, parent_id, remake, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, enabled, template, sort ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{src,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{close,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remake,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{template,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert into sys_menu
id,
icon,
title,
name,
type,
src,
close,
parent_id,
remake,
created_by,
created_time,
updated_by,
updated_time,
enabled,
template,
sort,

mapper.update:
update sys_menu
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
src = #{src,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
close = #{close,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remake = #{remake,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
template = #{template,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_menu set icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, src = #{src,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, close = #{close,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remake = #{remake,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, template = #{template,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT b.id, b.icon, b.title, b.`name`, b.type, b.src, b.`close`, b.parent_id, b.remake, b.created_by, b.created_time, b.updated_by, b.updated_time, b.enabled, b.template from sys_menu b left join sys_roule r on b.id=r.control_id where r.roule_id=#{merchantNo} and b.type=1 order by b.sort asc

SELECT m.id, m.icon, m.title, m.`name`, m.type, m.src, m.`close`, m.parent_id, m.remake, m.created_by, m.created_time, m.updated_by, m.updated_time, m.enabled, m.template from sys_menu m left join sys_roule r on r.control_id=m.id where r.type=1 and r.user_id=#{userId} order by m.sort asc
